documents.document:
Giving Up

I'm losing hope here about my crush. I think he's starting to become a little more immature. But he's so funny and clever. This is like my dream guy. But I'm just waiting for the time to come...

Break

Goodness, I've been through absolute HECK!!!
My friends can't see me, a seceret admirer is dieing, and school is not helping!!
My life..... it's just too much... I need to take a break from here
Won't reply probably till I'm ready...
Bye...... Sorry xx

Back Again...

I'm back again, and this time I need to point out something. If I'm not on this thing for ages, it's because I'm either busy, forgot my password again {{ lol }}, or I just can't be bothered.

My life is pretty much half-and-half. My "issue" with about my mates blanking me out is over, I'm more better, and before you mention like my last Blog, yes my admirer is dead. He died on the 3rd Feb. 08, and I will miss him dearly {{ Although I've never met him }} R.I.P. Babes

Also, I had a photo of my dog, Rusty. Yeah, she's gone too. Went last year in July. I'll never forget her, she was amazing. R.I.P. Hun, missing you still

My love life. Forget it. I just am in no mood for a relationship at the moment. I just can't trust any boy. A month ago, this boy I knew in my secondary school in my tutor told me lies. He said he really fancied me since he came back, and he wanted to go out with me. But he smokes, so I was unsure. After a few weeks, I was told by one of his mates {{ that guy is my mate too }} that he told him that he didn't say it. So I took the hint and realised it was all lies. So, I told my mates who I talked to about him, and a couple were pissed off. Especially my mate, Charlotte {{ A.K.A. Chaz }}. She flipped, and just started having a go at him. Then he said that he hated us both... And now since I posted this, two days ago, he started to talk to me again... What the heck?? So now, I think we're OK as friends. But that has made a big scar inside me, so I'm guessing finding a good boy may be more difficult now

Oh well, I got all my mates anyway. Screw my family, cos right now I am just so sick of them! They think I cause arguments and also blame me for most things they complain about So yeah, stuff them! My mates are my family, that's good enough

That's it for now, won't post another Blog for a while, so yeah comment if you want - no bullshit on here though, cos love, I'm not in the mood.

Laters !

I hate my school life

Today has been the worst school day in my life In English lesson I couldn't think of an idea for a sentence, and then a couple of people said that I was a retard and they said to each other "we are not shy" then I cried silently so nobody could hear, but only 2 people heard, and they left me alone I know I said that I am posting my blogs every Saturday and Monday, but that's changed. From now on I'll be posting a blog whenever I have something to say. Well today was a bad day, but I hope things at school get better. So for now, I'll be off for a while...

Things are getting worse for me

Life at school is just getting worse Today, someone put glue on my trousers and another annoyed me like shit and in science the guy im next to kept on poking me and I got well annoyed It seems that everyone i don't like in my lessons are pissing me off!! I can't take it much longer, so I'll try and live through this week...

Things Are Getting Better Now

Well, Friday was the only good day last week, after being angry and annoyed by chavs But now, things are looking up for me I got mates who care for me, and that's what has kept me strong so I'm feeling better, but now I think I'm getting a cold, no thanks to a mate

Here I Go Again...

Today was one of my most embarrassing moments in German lesson. Chavs were annoying my friend, saying that her hood rim (with 100% FAKE FUR) had REAL FUR, but she bloody doesn't. Otherwise, she would have had a rich house with a swimming pool, sauna and all that crap!! So, she got upset and then the Chavs again said "Oh you're crying" like it's a joke. So I tried to help her by telling them to shut up and what happens?? THEY LAUGH!! All I was trying to do was stick up fo my friend, and after that, I felt so stupid saying that...

SNOW!!!!!

Today was a wicked day at school! IT SNOWED!!! And there was a massive snowball fight at the front of my school. I got hit at the back of my thigh and it hurt and then an annoying guy called Courtney flicked water at me But it doesn't matter. It snowed, and I'm very cheery today

I'm All Alone...

Today is of course Valentine's Day and today for me was an upsetting day I think this guy who I really like, has a girlfriend. NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!! I don't know what to do?? I'm too scared to tell him I like him. Even if I did, everyone will laugh So today was the worst Valentine's Day ever!!

Yay!!

Yay, I got a week off school but I don't know what I'm doing this week. All I know is on Sunday my brother's friend's foster sister is coming to my hometown, so I can't wait and on Thursday, I'm going to Eastleigh with my mum, my sister and my aunt and cousins. So for the other days, I have no idea what I'm doing, so I just have to wait and see...

Busy, Busy Busy

This week for my 1/2 term is quite alot. Yesterday I went to my aunt's new house, (which looks really good) today I got my baby cousin today as usual. Wednesday, I'm sleeping over at my little cousins' house. Then, on Thursday, I'm going to Eastleigh with my little cousins, their mum and my mum and my sister, then on Friday, I got Emma again (I always have her on Tuesdays and Thursdays). So this week is busy, busy busy! Then I got the weekend to do something. Maybe I could sleep in my bed all day...

I'm So Excited!!

Yay!! I'm so excited today!! Tomorrow I'm going canoeing for an off-site activity in Youth In Romsey. I can barely wait for that day!! Today was a good day, as I saw all my friends again and missed them so much, although it was only a week off school. Anyway, canoeing is going to be a first time I'm doing it so I am a little nervous. But hey ho, I can't wait!! On the other hand, Wednesday is when I have the dentist. That's what I CAN wait for!!

Poor Chaz...

Today my mate was upset cos some chavette pissed her off. Chaz cried in the toilets, poor thing. I don't see why everyone is against her! She's done nothing to them so why does she suffer?! She's OK now, but I hope she gets better soon. She's got mates around her that will keep her going...
